title-english: Women Throughout the Month of June
creator: Bint Al Nil
description-english: This article presents a collection of women-related news covering the month of June, such as the end of service of two foreign ambassadresses to Egypt. It also features a brief coverage of three charity parties held in June.
description-arabic: تستعرض المقالة أخبار المرأة خلال شهر يونية الماضي، منها مغادرة سفيرتين أجنبيتين لمصر بعد انتهاء مدة خدمتهما فيها. كما تقدم المقالة تغطية للحفلات الخيرية التي أقيمت خلال الشهر.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
repository: Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library
